

5065 MiB = 10132

5311000000 = 10132

10132 / 5311000000 = 0.00000191


----


(112217 - 102432) /  5.13*10^9 bytes = 0,00000191 block/byte

5.13*10^9 / (112217 - 102432) = 524272,84466019 byte/block

2.5*1024*1024*1024*1024 / 524272

5_243_040 blocks

522901,73651483

2.5*1000*1000*1000*1000 / 4781013
